March 21, 1953 D North West Area (Second Section)
North West Area (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest North West Area north-west-area-second-section National Championship of Great Britain (Second Section Final)
North West
Second
Test Piece Contest
King Lear
Victoria Hall, Bolton, Greater Manchester, England, UK Contest was originally won by Hesketh Bank with 190 points, but who were then disqualified for breach of rules which they admitted. 10 bands competed
Jan. 18, 2012, 1:18 p.m. Oct. 19, 2016, 3:15 p.m.
